name: abphelper-gui
description: AbpHelper is a tool that helps you with developing Abp vNext applications.
author: EasyAbp

scripts.start: cd ../dotnet/src/EasyAbp.AbpHelper.Gui.Blazor && dotnet publish -c Release -o ../../../electron/dotnet/EasyAbp.AbpHelper.Gui.Blazor && cd ../../../electron && electron .
scripts.dev: cd ../dotnet/src/EasyAbp.AbpHelper.Gui.Blazor && dotnet publish -c Release -o ../../../electron/dotnet/EasyAbp.AbpHelper.Gui.Blazor && cd ../../../electron && electron . --dev-debug
scripts.package: cd ../dotnet/src/EasyAbp.AbpHelper.Gui.Blazor && dotnet publish -c Release -o ../../../electron/dotnet/EasyAbp.AbpHelper.Gui.Blazor && cd ../../../electron && electron-builder
